Displaying a Chart in Visual Diff

Visual Diff allows you to display a chart that shows the results of the file comparison.

To display a chart summarizing the comparison:

  1. In the Visual Diff window, compare two files.

  2. Select File > Chart from the menu, or click the Charts button. This action displays a bar chart of the lines that matched and the lines that were inserted, deleted, or replaced. If the Show line numbers option has been checked on the Display tab for Edit > Options, the chart also shows the specific number of matching, inserted, deleted, and replaced lines.
